item.title: Preview Hugo on Mobile or Local Network
item.description: To preview hugo development website on mobile phone or local network, you need to tell hugo server to bind to baseUrl the your local IP address. Im my case hugo server --buildDrafts --bind 192.168.X.XXX --baseURL http://192.168.X.XXX If the IP address is assigned dynamically by the router, the command needs to be modified each time the address change.
